statements: SELECT * FROM music_genre_distribution WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM music_genre_distribution WHERE region_name = 'Europe';
SELECT region_id, region_name, genre_id, genre_name FROM music_genre_distribution ORDER BY region_id, genre_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM music_genre_distribution WHERE genre_name = 'Pop';
SELECT region_name, COUNT(genre_id) AS genre_count FROM music_genre_distribution GROUP BY region_name HAVING genre_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM music_genre_distribution WHERE region_id = 1 AND genre_id = 2
SELECT genre_name, region_name FROM music_genre_distribution WHERE region_id = 3 ORDER BY genre_name DESC
SELECT region_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM music_genre_distribution GROUP BY region_id HAVING total_count > 10
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM music_genre_distribution ORDER BY region_name ASC, genre_name DESC
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(*) AS genre_count FROM music_genre_distributon WHERE region_id = 2 GROUP BY genre_name HAVING genre_count > 5
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT genre_name, region_name FROM music_genres INNER JOIN regions ON music_genres.region_id = regions.region_id;
SELECT region_name, COUNT(*) AS total_genres FROM regions LEFT JOIN music_genres ON regions.region_id = music_genres.region_id GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT * FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, COUNT(*) AS genre_count FROM regions JOIN music_genres ON regions.region_id = music_genres.region_id GROUP BY region_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY genre_count DESC;
SELECT genre_name, region_name FROM music_genres JOIN regions ON music_genres.region_id = regions.region_id WHERE genre_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY genre_name ASC, region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, genre_name FROM regions LEFT JOIN music_genres ON regions.region_id = music_genres.region_id WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%' OR region_name LIKE 'E%' ORDER BY region_name, genre_name;
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM regions JOIN music_genres ON regions.region_id = music_genres.region_id WHERE genre_name = 'Rock' ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regions
SELECT region_name FROM regions ORDER BY region_id DESC
SELECT genre_name, percentage FROM music_genres JOIN distribution ON music_genres.genre_id = distribution.genre_id WHERE region_id = 2
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_regions FROM regions
SELECT AVG(percentage) AS average_percentage FROM distribution
SELECT * FROM regions
SELECT DISTINCT genre_name FROM music_genres
SELECT region_name, genre_name, percentage FROM regions r INNER JOIN distribution d ON r.region_id = d.region_id INNER JOIN music_genres m ON d.genre_id = m.genre_id
SELECT * FROM distribution WHERE percentage > 0.5 ORDER BY percentage DESC

SELECT region_name, genre_name, percentage FROM distribution d JOIN regions r ON d.region_id = r.region_id JOIN music_genres m ON d.genre_id = m.genre_id WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%' AND percentage < 0.7
SELECT * FROM regions
SELECT region_name FROM regions ORDER BY region_id ASC
SELECT genre_name FROM genres ORDER BY genre_id DESC
SELECT song_title, genre_id FROM songs WHERE region_id = 1
SELECT visualization_name FROM visualizations WHERE visualization_id = 3
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE genre_id = 1 AND region_id = 3;
SELECT song_title, genre_name, region_name FROM songs s JOIN genres g ON s.genre_id = g.genre_id JOIN regions r ON s.region_id = r.region_id;
SELECT s.song_title, v.visualization_name, r.region_name FROM visualizations v JOIN songs s ON v.region_id = s.region_id JOIN regions r ON v.region_id = r.region_id;
SELECT s.song_title, v.visualization_name, g.genre_name FROM visualizations v JOIN songs s ON v.region_id = s.region_id JOIN genres g ON v.genre_id = g.genre_id;

SELECT s.song_id, s.song_title, g.genre_name, COUNT(v.visualization_id) AS num_visualizations FROM songs s JOIN genres g ON s.genre_id = g.genre_id LEFT JOIN visualizations v ON s.region_id = v.region_id GROUP BY s.song_id;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT song_title, genre_name FROM songs JOIN genres ON songs.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT artist_name FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT artist_name, song_title FROM artists JOIN artist_songs ON artists.artist_id = artist_songs.aid JOIN songs ON artist_songs.sid = songs.song_id;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT * FROM songs ORDER BY song_title DESC;
SELECT artist_name, region_name FROM artists JOIN regions ON regions.region_id = artists.artist_id;
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(*) FROM genres JOIN songs ON genres.genre_id = songs.genre_id GROUP BY genre_name;
SELECT artist_name, song_title FROM artists JOIN artist_songs ON artists.artist_id = artist_songs.aid JOIN songs ON artist_songs.sid = songs.song_id;
